name: The Hartley Chair
description: The poise and refined allure of the Hartley makes it the perfect complement to an elegant dining set-up and gives new meaning to the term 'fine dining'. The dark-tinted beech finish of the Hartley's tapered legs creates a pleasing contrast with the paler tones of the upholstery. The gently curved seat meets the crisp lines of the backrest, creating a form that is the ideal balance of soft and smart. We offer the option of the Hartley with deep buttoning, for a classic look, or without, for something sleeker and more streamlined. As with the other chairs from the DAVIDSON collection the Hartley can be upholstered in a fabric or leather of your choice to suit any interior.
